column4: I installed Ubuntu 8.10 from live cd, I setup my initial user ... now I'm running aptitude and its asking for root.. do I have to setup root seperately? This is odd.
what's the quickest way to open new terminal?
don't set a password for root... instead use sudo all the time when you want to execute commands as root. If you want to execute lots in a row, you may want to do "sudo su"
